results.content: Excellent course. I've got a really good grasp of how floating layouts work now. I'm excited to see what I can do with them now. Since I was just starting I was using tables. For everything. Bad idea haha, it's just sloppy and doesn't look good. So I'm gonna take this back to my projects and redo the sites so they're cleaner and more efficient to build.

results.content: I think that the course is good except for the unnecessary dialogue from the instructor... the unedited, relaxed style he takes. I like a course to get to the point and then show the skill in practice.  He did do show a skill in practice, but I did find my mind wandering and getting bored while he was "talking to himself" as it were.   Thanks, RH
results.content_html: I think that the course is good except for the unnecessary dialogue from the instructor... the unedited, relaxed style he takes. He did do show a skill in practice, but I did find my mind wandering and getting bored while he was "talking to himself" as it were. Thanks, RH

results.content:
This is the 2nd course I've taken by this instructor.  I was extremely lucky to get both classes while they were briefly offered for free.  However, I liked both of them enough that I've now *purchased* two more courses.  As funds permit, I can see myself buying more still.

Geoff Blake's courses are comprehensive.  He makes everything EASY to understand.  He is CONSISTENT.  And, above all, he makes the courses FUN and INTERESTING!!

This is the 2nd course I've taken by this instructor. I was extremely lucky to get both classes while they were briefly offered for free. However, I liked both of them enough that I've now *purchased* two more courses. As funds permit, I can see myself buying more still.

Geoff Blake's courses are comprehensive. He makes everything EASY to understand. He is CONSISTENT. And, above all, he makes the courses FUN and INTERESTING!!

results.content: Apart from Geoff's usual easily followed style this course sort of shortly and sweetly pulled together what I have learned in his other HTML5, CSS3 and Wire-framing courses.

results.content: This is the course that i always wanted to understand css floats and layouts. I have to say Geoff Blake is an amazing tutor.

results.content: I am taking a class on CSS. This really helped me understand how to lay a page out step by step.

results.content: Easy to understand and follow along.  I like the casual way he teaches.  Way better than some of the robotic lessons I have heard before.  Only a short way into the lesson but very pleased so far.

results.content: This is a beginning CSS class, very little focus was placed on floating or complex layouts, all the layouts were very simple
